comment: * Container of rectangular position related info for the Editor.

variables.name: mEditorBounds
variables.comment: * The bounding box of the of currently focused text editor in local coordinates.

variables.name: mHandwritingBounds
variables.comment:
* The bounding box of the of currently focused text editor with additional padding around it
     * for initiating Stylus Handwriting in the current window.

variables.name: CREATOR
variables.comment: * Used to make this class parcelable.

methods.name: public RectF getEditorBounds()
methods.comment:
* Returns the bounds of the Editor in local coordinates.
     *
     * Screen coordinates can be obtained by transforming with the
     * {@link CursorAnchorInfo#getMatrix} of the containing {@code CursorAnchorInfo}.

methods.name: public RectF getHandwritingBounds()
methods.comment:
* Returns the bounds of the area that should be considered for initiating stylus handwriting
     * in local coordinates.
     *
     * Screen coordinates can be obtained by transforming with the
     * {@link CursorAnchorInfo#getMatrix} of the containing {@code CursorAnchorInfo}.

methods.name: public void writeToParcel(@NonNull Parcel dest, int flags)

methodNames: public void writeToParcel(@NonNull Parcel dest, int flags)
